spells.name: Bungle
spells.description: Target takes a -20 penalty on its next attack roll or check.

spells.name: Decompose Corpse
spells.description: Turn a corpse into a clean skeleton.

spells.name: Delusional Pride
spells.description: Target is penalized on attacks and checks but gains bonus against charms and compulsions.

spells.name: Diagnose Disease
spells.description: Detect and identify diseases.

spells.name: Ear-Piercing Scream
spells.description: Deal sonic damage and daze target.

spells.name: Forced Quiet
spells.description: Target cannot make loud noises.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: Target takes cold damage and is fatigued.

spells.name: Fumbletongue
spells.description: Target cannot speak intelligently.

spells.name: Hex Ward
spells.description: Target gains +4 on saves against witch hexes.

spells.name: Icicle Dagger
spells.description: Masterwork ice dagger deals +1 cold damage.

spells.name: Interrogation
spells.description: Target answers questions or suffers pain.

spells.name: Ki Arrow
spells.description: Arrow deals damage as your unarmed strike.

spells.name: Ray of Sickening
spells.description: Ray makes subject sickened.

spells.name: Remove Sickness
spells.description: Suppress disease, nausea, and the sickened condition.

spells.name: Restore Corpse
spells.description: Skeletal corpse grows flesh.

spells.name: Sanctify Corpse
spells.description: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead.

spells.name: Shadow Weapon
spells.description: Create a quasi-real masterwork weapon.

spells.name: Summon Minor Monster
spells.description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

spells.name: Unprepared Combatant
spells.description: Target takes -4 on initiative and Reflex saves.

spells.name: Vocal Alteration
spells.description: Disguise target's voice.

spells.name: Youthful Appearance
spells.description: Target appears younger.
